Synopsis: 
When the perfect war machine in history finds its first loss is due to a strong young man, Napoleon sent to six mercenaries battle-hardened with a single mission: to hunt in the mountains of Montserrat and cut off his head. 

After killing their loved ones, the group of mercenaries in their search is launched in the recesses and magic of the sacred mountain of Montserrat. The young man, who called Bruce to the place of battle, must struggle just to survive and avenge his family. He becomes a symbol of freedom and hope for his country, which distinguishes him as a hero who achieved what no one had ever achieved: to defeat the invincible army of Napoleon Bonaparte. 

Production notes: 
"Bruce" is starring Juan JosÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© Ballesta, Vincent Perez, Santi MillÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¡n, Astrid Berges-Frisbey, Nicolas Giraud, Moussa and Jerome Le Banner Maskri. Actors bring to life this story of Jordi Gasull part of a legend, the young man who causes the flight of Napoleon's troops through the echo of the mountains of Montserrat, their greatest allies. 

From this historical questions arise that make up the plot of this adventure film: What happened after he had defeated the French army, What did the powerful engine of Bonaparte? What was the hero of Bruc ...? The film Ikiru Films produced with the associated production of TVC, Laurion Telefonica and Investment, in partnership with The Toro Pictures and collaboration Mesfilms. 

The shooting went on for almost eight weeks in various locations as Collserola, Arnes, Santes Creus, CastellterÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â§ol, Montserrat and Mura.
